title: The Stolen Earth
summary: "The Stolen Earth" is the twelfth episode of the fourth series and the 750th overall episode[3] of the British science fiction television series Doctor Who. It was first broadcast on BBC One on 28 June 2008.[4] The episode was written by show runner and head writer Russell T Davies and is the first of a two-part crossover story with spin-offs Torchwood and The Sarah Jane Adventures; the concluding episode is "Journey's End", the finale of the fourth series, broadcast on 5 July.
